pr_title: Create new dedicated Rollup Action Group Config

timeline.message:
Create new dedicated Rollup Action Group Config

This commit migrates RollupAction away from using the
legacy Rollup's GroupConfig and DateHistogramGroupConfig
classes. RollupAction is not concerned with legacy intervals
and delays.

timeline.bodyText: I am not sure delay is needed for the RollupAction. I think this is a left over from the v1 rollup job that would tail the source index using a delay. Rollup should not wait for any delayed data. Right?
timeline.author: csoulios
